page.title: 17Computers
page.content: A {computer} uses microchips to enable it to store information in the form of electrical pulses. They are to used to carry out difficult calculations very quickly, and with great accuracy. They are also used to store large amounts of data, such as the information in this survey. It is also possible to carry out tests and experiments without using real objects. This saves time and money. {Computers} have been around for twenty or thirty years but only in the last four or five years have they been in common use in {shops, offices, homes and industries.} Home computers are mainly used for playing a variety of games. The most popular are {adventure games} involving exploration and investigation. {Simulations of driving and flying are also popular.} A few people use there computers for banking and shopping direct from their home.
